title: CashEntriesbySettlementDate
description: Cash entry type with daily settlement movement

referenceDate.description: Reference date for the transaction or process step

typeFinancialReport.description: Unique identifier for the process step or transaction record

clearingbrazilianPaymentSystem.description: Specific clearing identifier for the Brazilian Payment System (SPB) integration

clearingMemberIdentificationId.description: Unique identifier for the clearing member authorized for settlement

settlementBank.description: Informs the identification details of the Settlement Bank

settlementDate.description: Date when the transaction is settled

participantDestinationIdentificationId.description: Unique identifier for the party involved in the transaction

accountIdentification.description: Identifier for the account used in the transaction

cashEntryTypeCode.description: Identifies the characteristics of the cash entry

cashEntryValue.description: Monetary value of the cash entry, in BRL
cashEntryValue.$comment: Falta um tamanho min e max aqui?

asset.description: Description or code of the financial asset involved

isin.description: International Securities Identification Number - Standardized international code for unique identification of financial securities
isin.$comment: Structure BR AAAA BBB CC D where: BR=Brazil country code, AAAA=issuer identification (alphanumeric), BBB=asset type (alphanumeric), CC=species or sequence (alphanumeric), D=check digit (numeric)
